translation.en: [partygoers] Five, four, three, two, one!
translation.zh: （1980年新年快乐） 五、四、三、二、一！

translation.en: [preacher] Thank Heaven!
translation.zh: 感谢上天！

translation.en: The crisis, the danger, is past…
translation.zh: 危机、危险已经过去…

translation.en: and the lingering illness is over at last.
translation.zh: 挥之不去的疾病终于结束了

translation.en: And the fever called "living" is conquered at last.
translation.zh: 这场叫“生存”的热病终于被战胜

translation.en: Be silent in that solitude, which is not loneliness.
translation.zh: 孤独时请不要作声 那孤独并不是寂寞

translation.en: For then, the spirits of the dead
translation.zh: 因为那些活着时

translation.en: -who stood in life before thee-- -[screams]
translation.zh: 曾站在你面前的人 他们的亡灵

translation.en: -…are again in death around thee. -[shouts]
translation.zh: 会再次缠绕在你身边

translation.en: -[gasps] -The breeze, the breath of God, is still,
translation.zh: 微风 也就是上帝的呼吸 静止不动

translation.en: and the mist upon the hill, shadowy, shadowy
translation.zh: 山上的雾气 昏暗朦胧

translation.en: yet unbroken, is a symbol and a token.
translation.zh: 但牢不可破 那是一个符号和象征

translation.en: How it hangs upon the trees, a mystery of mysteries.
translation.zh: 它是如何挂上树梢的 这是谜中之谜中

translation.en: The boundaries which divide life from death
translation.zh: 生死界线

translation.en: are at best shadowy and vague.
translation.zh: 只能说是模糊不清的

translation.en: Who shall say where the one ends and where the other begins.
translation.zh: 谁能说清一条生命的终结和起始？

translation.en: We stand on the brink of a precipice.
translation.zh: 我们站在悬崖边缘

translation.en: -Grampus. What is it? -[preacher] We peer into the abyss.
translation.zh: -虎鲸 -我们凝视深渊 -怎么了？ -我们会恶心眩晕

translation.en: We grow sick and dizzy.
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -我们会恶心眩晕

translation.en: She's here.
translation.zh: 她来了

translation.en: [preacher] Our first impulse is to shrink from the danger.
translation.zh: 我们的第一反应是躲避危险

translation.en: Unaccountably, we remain.
translation.zh: 但无法解释的是我们留了下来

translation.en: [reporter] Roderick!
translation.zh: 罗德里克！

translation.en: Sir, do you have a comment?
translation.zh: 先生 您有什么要说的吗？

translation.en: You are not going to believe this. He's on the phone.
translation.zh: 你不会相信的 他现在就在电话上

translation.en: He wants to meet with you tonight.
translation.zh: 他想今晚见你

translation.en: -Who? -Him.
translation.zh: -谁？ -他

translation.en: He sent an address. A…
translation.zh: 他发过来了一个地址 一个…

translation.en: A weird address, but it was actually him.
translation.zh: 一个奇怪的地址 但真的是他

translation.en: Not a secretary, not an assistant, not even the Pym Reaper.
translation.zh: 不是秘书 不是助理 甚至不是死神皮姆

translation.en: It was him.
translation.zh: 是他本人

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: [Roderick] Well, come on if you're coming.
translation.zh: 要是你来了就继续往里走

translation.en: Cognac?
translation.zh: 喝干邑吗？

translation.en: No, thank you.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry…
translation.zh: 听着 我很遗憾…

translation.en: for your loss, your…
translation.zh: 为您失去了…

translation.en: your losses, rather.
translation.zh: 为您的损失

translation.en: Henri IV Dudognon Heritage Cognac Grande Champagne.
translation.zh: 亨利四世多贡干邑

translation.en: Most expensive in the world.
translation.zh: 世界上最贵的

translation.en: This bottle was four million euros at auction.
translation.zh: 这一瓶的拍卖价是四百万欧

translation.en: Produced since 1776.
translation.zh: 从1776年开始生产

translation.en: Aged in barrels for more than 100 years.
translation.zh: 在酒桶里酿藏了超过一百年

translation.en: And the bottle itself dipped in 18 karat yellow gold,
translation.zh: 瓶身是18K黄金的

translation.en: inlaid with 4,100 high-quality diamonds.
translation.zh: 上面镶嵌有4100颗高品质钻石

translation.en: You know, a single pour…
translation.zh: 知道吗 就一点…

translation.en: it probably cost twice your annual salary.
translation.zh: 价格可能就是你年薪的两倍

translation.en: Have a glass.
translation.zh: 喝一杯吧

translation.en: See what a few years' of your worth tastes like.
translation.zh: 尝尝你几年的薪水是什么味道

translation.en: I mean it, Roderick.
translation.zh: 我说真的 罗德里克

translation.en: It's unimaginable and I am truly sorry--
translation.zh: 那是无法想象的 我真的非常遗憾…

translation.en: No, I understand, Auggie. You're sorry my children are all dead.
translation.zh: 不 我明白 奥吉 你很遗憾我所有的孩子都死了

translation.en: Where's Mr. Pym? It's better we talk with your attorney present.
translation.zh: 皮姆先生呢？这次谈话最好 在您的律师在场的情况下进行

translation.en: How many subpoenas have you sent me over the years?
translation.zh: 这些年来你给我发了多少张传票？

translation.en: You finally got me.
translation.zh: 你现在终于逮到我了

translation.en: You're hung up on protocol.
translation.zh: 你太死板了

translation.en: -Waive it then. -Fine. I waive my right to an attorney.
translation.zh: -那就放弃吧 -可以 我放弃请律师的权利

translation.en: Here's to Title 18, Section 371.
translation.zh: 为第18款第371条干杯

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然了

translation.en: What's not to celebrate? You got away with it.
translation.zh: 干吗不庆祝呢？你脱身了

translation.en: -Again. -Nobody gets away with anything.
translation.zh: -再一次 -没有谁逃脱了

translation.en: Not really.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: [chuckles] Madeline would beg to differ.
translation.zh: 玛德琳不会这么认为

translation.en: You can ask yourself. She's downstairs in the basement.
translation.zh: 你可以亲自去问 她在地下室

translation.en: Oh, that's right, she's an even tougher get than me.
translation.zh: 没错 她比我还难搞

translation.en: Have you ever had her on the record? I don't think you have.
translation.zh: 她在警方的记录里吗？我觉得不在

translation.en: You've never had either of us on the record. -Have you? -[phone vibrates]
translation.zh: 我们俩都不在你们的记录里 对吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry, um…
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -It's my granddaughter, Lenore. -You can take that if you need to.
translation.zh: -是我孙女丽诺尔打来的 -如果需要 您就接吧

translation.en: Grandkids take priority.
translation.zh: 孙辈孩子优先

translation.en: Don't lecture me about family values.
translation.zh: 少在家庭价值观方面给我上课

translation.en: You're just as shit in that department as I am.
translation.zh: 你跟我一样做得都不怎么样

translation.en: I called you to give you the only thing you've ever wanted.
translation.zh: 我打电话给你 是为了给你你唯一想要的东西

translation.en: My confession.
translation.zh: 我的供词

translation.en: This is Assistant U.S. Attorney C. A. Dupin, sitting with Roderick Usher.
translation.zh: 我是美国助理检察官CA·杜潘 跟我坐在一起的是罗德里克·亚瑟

translation.en: November 20th, 2023.
Mr. Usher has waived his right to have an attorney present.
translation.zh: 亚瑟先生放弃其聘请律师的权利

translation.en: And Mr. Dupin has waived a glass of Henri IV, so which of us is crazier?
translation.zh: 而杜潘先生放弃了一杯亨利四世干邑 所以 我们俩谁更不正常？

translation.en: Just warming it up.
translation.zh: 我只是让这杯酒再暖暖

translation.en: This is indeed Roderick Usher.
translation.zh: 我是罗德里克·亚瑟本人

translation.en: We're in my childhood home.
translation.zh: 我们现在在我儿时的家里

translation.en: Yeah, this is where I grew up. Kept it all these years.
translation.zh: 是的 这里是我长大的地方 这些年来一直保留了下来

translation.en: The whole neighborhood…
translation.zh: 其实 保留下来的…

translation.en: actually.
translation.zh: 还有整个左邻右舍

translation.en: So I can watch the paint peel.
translation.zh: 这样在我需要提神醒脑的时候

translation.en: The weeds grow.
translation.zh: 我就能看墙漆脱落

translation.en: And smell the rot if I needed a pick-me-up.
translation.zh: 野草生长 闻一闻腐烂的味道

translation.en: And what exactly are you confessing to?
translation.zh: 你要供认的准确来说是什么？

translation.en: You mentioned Title 18, Section 371.
translation.zh: 你前面提到了第18款第371条

translation.en: -That's defrauding the U.S. government… -All of it.
translation.zh: -那是欺诈美国政府… -所有一切

translation.en: -All of it? -The whole thing.
translation.zh: -所有一切吗？ -所有一切

translation.en: You brought what, uh, 73 charges?
translation.zh: 你之前提起了73条指控吗？

translation.en: All of them, everything, all yours. Right now.
translation.zh: 所有的 每一条 我都认 现在就认

translation.en: And I'll throw in a…
translation.zh: 而且我要…

translation.en: a bonus.
translation.zh: 再加一项

translation.en: I'll tell you how my children died.
translation.zh: 告诉你我的孩子们都是怎么死的

translation.en: I know how they died, Roderick. Everybody knows.
translation.zh: 我知道他们是怎么死的 罗德里克 人人都知道

translation.en: Believe me, Mr. Dupin, when I tell you, you don't know a thing.
translation.zh: 相信我 杜潘先生 你其实什么都不知道

translation.en: But where to start?
translation.zh: 但从哪开始说起呢？

translation.en: At the beginning, I suppose…
translation.zh: 我想要从一开始说起…

translation.en: is here…
translation.zh: 那就是这里…

translation.en: in this very room.
translation.zh: 就是这个房间

translation.en: You cannot understand the things I've done,
translation.zh: 你不会理解我所做的事 （1953年）

translation.en: unless you understand the life that Madeline and I were born into.
translation.zh: 除非你了解我和玛德琳的出身 是什么样的

translation.en: And the woman who would shape every choice we'd ever make.
translation.zh: 还有那个影响到我们所做的 每一个决定的女人

translation.en: Our mother.
translation.zh: 我们的母亲

translation.en: Eliza.
translation.zh: 伊莱扎

translation.en: She was personal secretary to the CEO of Fortunato Pharmaceuticals.
translation.zh: 她是弗特纳多制药公司CEO的秘书

translation.en: William Longfellow back then.
translation.zh: 当时是威廉·朗弗罗

translation.en: A man of appetites.
translation.zh: 一个欲望很强的人

translation.en: A man of business, who once reportedly told his wife…
translation.zh: 一个商人 曾有报道说 他告诉自己的妻子…

translation.en: Children are never too tender to be whipped.
translation.zh: 孩子们就要打

translation.en: Like tough beefsteaks, the more you beat them,
translation.zh: 他们就像牛肉干 越打

translation.en: the more tender they become.
translation.zh: 就会变得越软

translation.en: [Roderick] For reasons we were far too young to understand,
translation.zh: 我们当时太年幼 无法理解

translation.en: we were forbidden to go anywhere near Longfellow's house.
translation.zh: 但我们被禁止去朗弗罗家周围

translation.en: It was one of our mother's most insistent rules.
translation.zh: 那是我们母亲最坚持的规矩之一

translation.en: So Madeline being Madeline, insisted that we break it.
translation.zh: 玛德琳天生反骨 非要违反看看

translation.en: Spy! Climbing my fence!
translation.zh: 间谍！翻爬我家的围栏！

translation.en: Not here. Not ever. We agreed.
translation.zh: 永远都不能来这里 我们说好了的

translation.en: -[whispers] I'm sorry. -Let go of her arm.
translation.zh: -对不起 -放开她的手臂

translation.en: -[woman] Honey? -Oh, nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: -亲爱的？ -哦 没什么可担心的

translation.en: We've just had a couple of lookie-loos, that's all.
translation.zh: 有人想看看我们家 仅此而已

translation.en: I'm so sorry, ma'am, it won't happen again.
translation.zh: 抱歉 女士 不会有下次了

translation.en: Eliza? Is he all right?
translation.zh: 伊莱扎？他没事吧？

translation.en: -He's fine. -No harm done. We'll talk about it Monday.
translation.zh: -他没事 -没受伤 我们周一再说

translation.en: Just make sure those Emory files are on my desk when I get in.
translation.zh: 确保我到办公室的时候 会看到埃莫里公司的文件

translation.en: Of course, Mr. Longfellow.
translation.zh: 好的 朗弗罗先生

translation.en: [Roderick] Madeline hated Longfellow, even then.
translation.zh: 玛德琳那时就讨厌朗弗罗

translation.en: She knew, somehow.
translation.zh: 她那时就知道

translation.en: -Madeline. -[Roderick] She always knew.
translation.zh: -玛德琳 -她一直都知道

translation.en: [Eliza] We stay away from Mr. Longfellow's house.
translation.zh: 我们远离朗弗罗家的房子

translation.en: -We were just trying to see… -[Eliza] You know the rules, Madeline.
translation.zh: -我们想看… -你知道规矩的 玛德琳

translation.en: Just like God the Father is on high
translation.zh: 天父在天上看着

translation.en: and loves us from far away, the same is true for Mr. Longfellow.
translation.zh: 在远处关爱着我们 朗弗罗先生也是如此

translation.en: He's mean.
translation.zh: 他很刻薄

translation.en: He's complicated.
translation.zh: 他很复杂

translation.en: Like God.
translation.zh: 跟上帝一样

translation.en: -How's your foot? -It hurts.
translation.zh: -你的脚怎么样了？ -疼

translation.en: Remember what Mother Teresa said,
translation.zh: 记住特蕾莎修女说的话

translation.en: "Pain and suffering are like the kiss of Jesus."
translation.zh: “悲痛和劫难是耶稣的吻”

translation.en: It just means you've come so close to him that he can kiss you.
translation.zh: 意思是你已经离他非常近了 他都能亲吻到你

translation.en: [Roderick] If pain and suffering were the kisses of Jesus,
translation.zh: 如果悲痛和劫难是耶稣的吻

translation.en: then he kissed the living fuck out of my mother
translation.zh: 那在后面几年里

translation.en: in the years that followed.
translation.zh: 他却让我母亲生不如死

translation.en: [Roderick] Okay, Mom, okay.
translation.zh: 好的 妈妈 行了

translation.en: -[gasps in pain] -Here. Here. -No! [grunts] -[glass shatters]
translation.zh: -来 -不！

translation.en: Mom, you have to drink and… And we think maybe…
translation.zh: 妈妈 你必须要喝 我们觉得也许…

translation.en: Maybe we need to call a doctor, like on the TV.
translation.zh: 也许我们要找医生来 就像电视里那样

translation.en: -[Eliza] No! -[Roderick] Mom, please.
translation.zh: -不行！ -妈妈 求你了

translation.en: Jesus showed us
translation.zh: 耶稣给我们展示过

translation.en: how to heal the sick, and it wasn't through medicine!
translation.zh: 如何治愈疾病 不是通过吃药！

translation.en: Where is your faith?
translation.zh: 你们的信仰呢？

translation.en: Your body is a temple of God.
translation.zh: 你的身体是神的圣殿

translation.en: And you'd pollute it?!
translation.zh: 可你却要污染它吗？

translation.en: Don't say what you want, say what makes him say what you want.
translation.zh: 不要说你想要什么 要让他来说你想要什么

translation.en: That way it's his idea.
translation.zh: 那是他的主意

translation.en: Mom said we're not supposed to ever bother him. Him especially.
translation.zh: 妈妈说过别去打扰他 尤其是他

translation.en: Trust me, it's the least he can do. Okay, now let's go over it one more time.
translation.zh: 相信我 他起码能做到这一点 好吧 我们现在再练习一次

translation.en: Sorry to bother you, Mr. Longfellow, but since she worked for you
translation.zh: 抱歉打扰你 朗弗罗先生 但因为她为你工作了这么久

translation.en: so well for so long, almost 20 years, we thought you would want to know…
translation.zh: 差不多有20年 我们认为你该知道…

translation.en: [Roderick] She's getting worse.
translation.zh: 她的情况越来越差了

translation.en: And we know that you're… You're so good at helping people.
translation.zh: 而且我们知道您非常乐善好施

translation.en: [Roderick] She always said you were a man that could move mountains,
translation.zh: 她一直都说您无所不能

translation.en: talk anyone into anything.
translation.zh: 能说服任何人做任何事

translation.en: You were the smartest man she ever met.
translation.zh: 您是她认识的最聪明的人

translation.en: Uh, we're here to ask you, maybe you have an idea.
translation.zh: 我们来是想请求您 也许您会有办法

translation.en: Maybe you could talk her into it.
translation.zh: 也许您能说服她

translation.en: I'm sorry, you're here at my home
translation.zh: 抱歉 你们来我家

translation.en: so I'll talk your mother into seeing a doctor?
translation.zh: 让我去说服你们的妈妈去看医生？

translation.en: She won't take any medicine. Nothing.
translation.zh: 她不肯吃药 什么药都不吃

translation.en: Won't see any doctors. And she's in so much pain.
translation.zh: 不肯看医生 可她现在疼得厉害

translation.en: [Roderick] We thought if you could help her,
translation.zh: 我们觉得如果您能帮她

translation.en: if you told her what she needs to do, she might listen.
translation.zh: 如果您告诉她她需要什么 也许她会听的

translation.en: She won't listen to us. But you, she…
translation.zh: 她不肯听我们的 但是您 她…

translation.en: I mean…
translation.zh: 我是说…

translation.en: She loves you.
translation.zh: 她爱您

translation.en: -What did you say? -It's the least you could do. For her.
translation.zh: -你说什么？ -这是您起码能做的 为了她

translation.en: For us.
translation.zh: 为了我们

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about. No idea, okay?
translation.zh: 我不知道你们在说什么 不知道 好吗？

translation.en: Eliza was a decent worker for a long time, but she lost it. Didn't she?
translation.zh: 伊莱扎很长时间都是一位好员工 但她疯了 不是吗？

translation.en: Now take your insinuations, your fucking false insinuations,
translation.zh: 现在带上你们的指控 虚假的指控

translation.en: take your grift and get off my property.
translation.zh: 带上你们的假话 滚出我家

translation.en: [woman] Are those…
translation.zh: 那是…

translation.en: Are those Eliza's kids?
translation.zh: 那是伊莱扎的孩子们吗？

translation.en: What do we do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: We know what she wouldn't want us to do.
translation.zh: 我们知道她不想让我们干什么

translation.en: If we call someone that means police.
translation.zh: 如果我们找人 警察就会上门来

translation.en: -Doctors, they'll embalm her. -They can't.
translation.zh: -和医生 会给她做防腐处理 -不能那样

translation.en: [Madeline] I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: So what do we do?
translation.zh: 那我们该怎么办？

translation.en: [Roderick] Thank Heaven! The crisis, the danger, was past,
translation.zh: 感谢上天！ 危机、危险已经过去…

translation.en: and the lingering illness was over at last.
translation.zh: 挥之不去的疾病终于结束了

translation.en: And the fever called "living" was conquered at last.
translation.zh: 这场叫“圣俸”的热病终于被战胜

translation.en: Come, let the burial rite be read,
translation.zh: 来吧 诵读悼词

translation.en: the funeral song be sung,
translation.zh: 吟唱葬歌

translation.en: an anthem for the queenliest dead
translation.zh: 一首献给死去的女王的赞歌

translation.en: that ever died so young.
translation.zh: 如此英年早逝

translation.en: [Roderick] Maddie!
translation.zh: 玛迪！

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -[Roderick] Mom! -[Madeline] Mommy!
translation.zh: -妈妈！ -妈妈！

translation.en: [Roderick] Mommy!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: I mean, she's probably passed out somewhere, right?
translation.zh: 她可能昏倒在什么地方了 对吗？

translation.en: She had to crawl up, break out, she probably just passed right out.
translation.zh: 她得从坟里爬出来 也许晕倒了

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: -What do we do? -Call a doctor.
translation.zh: -我们该怎么办？ -打电话叫医生

translation.en: We've got to call! I don't care what she says.
translation.zh: 我们必须打电话！我不在乎她怎么说

translation.en: It was an accident. They got to know we didn't mean to…
translation.zh: 那是个意外 我们并非有意…

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: -We didn't know. -We're sorry. Please, Mommy.
translation.zh: -我们不知道 -对不起 求你了 妈妈

translation.en: No, the whole street's out, it's not just us!
translation.zh: 不 整条街都停电了 不光是我们家！

translation.en: Who is that?
translation.zh: 是谁啊？

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你来干什么？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天啊

translation.en: Mom!
translation.zh: 妈妈！

translation.en: William!
translation.zh: 威廉！

translation.en: [woman] William!
translation.zh: 威廉！

translation.en: [woman] William!
translation.zh: 威廉！

translation.en: The official story was Longfellow had a heart attack in his sleep.
translation.zh: 官方说法是朗弗罗在睡梦中 突发心脏病而死

translation.en: That was before the Internet. Prehistoric times.
translation.zh: 那是在有互联网之前 史前时代了

translation.en: The nastiest bits we cleaned up after I took over the company.
translation.zh: 那是在我接手这家公司后 掩盖的最骇人听闻的事

translation.en: To spare the family any embarrassment.
translation.zh: 好让这个家族免受难堪

translation.en: I mean, my family, the Usher family.
translation.zh: 我是指我的家族 亚瑟家族

translation.en: The last thing my mother did in this life…
translation.zh: 我母亲在一生中做的最后一件事…

translation.en: was kill a powerful man.
translation.zh: 就是杀了一个有权势的人

translation.en: And we carried that secret with us, and loved her all the more.
translation.zh: 而我们隐藏并背负下那个秘密 更加爱她

translation.en: She was…
translation.zh: 她…

translation.en: remarkable.
translation.zh: 非常了不起

translation.en: Why are you telling me this? Why are we talking about your mother?
translation.zh: 你为什么要告诉我这件事？ 为什么要告诉我你母亲的事？

translation.en: Oh, I assume that I'm supposed to because she's here.
translation.zh: 我认为应该告诉你 因为她就在这里

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: She's right behind you.
translation.zh: 她就在你身后

translation.en: You know, I read somewhere about high-powered negotiation tactics.
translation.zh: 要知道 我读过有关高级别 谈判策略的东西

translation.en: How some truly brilliant business people
translation.zh: 关于一些真正精明的商人

translation.en: will plant these moments into high-stakes conversations.
translation.zh: 如何在关乎重大利益的对话中 植入这样的时刻

translation.en: Force a reaction, no matter how trivial.
translation.zh: 逼迫对方做出反应 不论多么细微

translation.en: Talk softly to make an adversary lean in.
translation.zh: 轻声说话 让对手前倾

translation.en: Make them repeat themselves. Throw your eyeline behind them.
translation.zh: 让对方重复他们自己说的话 而你则看向他们的身后

translation.en: Make them…
translation.zh: 让他们…

translation.en: turn around.
translation.zh: 转过身去

translation.en: Just something to assert a little control.
translation.zh: 就是一些小方法施加一点控制

translation.en: I'm not going to turn around, Roderick.
translation.zh: 我是不会转身的 罗德里克

translation.en: That's fine with me.
translation.zh: 我没意见

translation.en: So, why are you telling me this?
translation.zh: 那你为什么要告诉我这些？

translation.en: Because… Well, we were talking about my kids, weren't we?
translation.zh: 因为…我们在说我的孩子们 对吗？

translation.en: And… And this is important to know
translation.zh: 知道这一点非常重要

translation.en: when we talk about how they died.
translation.zh: 对于讨论他们是怎么死的

translation.en: And why I treated them the way I did.
translation.zh: 对于我为什么要这样对待他们

translation.en: And why they were the way they were, was because of my dad.
translation.zh: 以及为什么说他们变成那样 是因为我的父亲 都很重要

translation.en: I just promised I would never do what he did.
translation.zh: 我曾发誓说自己绝不会 做他做的那些事

translation.en: I wouldn't close the gates. If you're my blood, you're my blood.
translation.zh: 我不会将他们拒之门外 如果你是我的孩子 那么你就是

translation.en: Doesn't matter how you got here, who your mother was. I have six kids.
translation.zh: 不管你是怎么成为我的孩子的 你母亲是谁 我有六个孩子

translation.en: Six kids by five mothers.
translation.zh: 跟五个女人生的六个孩子

translation.en: But they're all mine.
translation.zh: 但他们都是我的孩子

translation.en: And I treated them so.
translation.zh: 我也是这么对待他们的

translation.en: If you're an Usher,
translation.zh: 如果你姓亚瑟

translation.en: the gates are open. Period.
translation.zh: 大门就是敞开的 就这么简单

translation.en: Matter of principle.
translation.zh: 这是原则问题

translation.en: Your granddaughter again?
translation.zh: 又是你孙女打来的？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [Auguste] Mmm. The gates are always open,
translation.zh: 大门永远都是敞开的

translation.en: but that doesn't mean you answer the phone.
translation.zh: 但不代表你要接这个电话

translation.en: No, it does not.
translation.zh: 对 没错

translation.en: Day will come, she'll stop texting.
translation.zh: 总有一天 她会停止发短信的

translation.en: They all do, sooner or later.
translation.zh: 他们都会 迟早都会

translation.en: Your grandkids are at your house right now, with your kids too,
translation.zh: 你的孙子孙女现在就在你家 你的孩子们也在

translation.en: and you're here with me.
translation.zh: 可你却跟我坐在这里

translation.en: So let's skip the soapbox.
translation.zh: 所以咱们别纠结这个话题了

translation.en: Are you watching my house?
translation.zh: 你在监视我家吗？

translation.en: If I'm not mistaken, I never saw your husband at the courtroom.
translation.zh: 如果我没搞错的话 我从没在法庭上见过你丈夫

translation.en: Not once.
translation.zh: 一次都没有

translation.en: A culmination of your life's work, and he wasn't there, rooting you on.
translation.zh: 你一生事业的巅峰时刻 他却没到场支持你

translation.en: Why is that, if you're such an expert on family values?
translation.zh: 如果你这么了解家庭价值 为什么会那样？

translation.en: And come to think of it, my whole family was there. Day one.
translation.zh: 我想了想 我的整个家族从一开始就到场了

translation.en: In fairness, a few of them were indicted co-conspirators.
translation.zh: 他们当中有几个人被起诉是同谋

translation.en: -Hey now. -My family didn't need to be there.
translation.zh: -嘿 小心说话 -我的家人不需要到场

translation.en: I didn't want them anywhere near you people.
translation.zh: 我不想让他们接触你们

translation.en: You always were an effective orator, Auggie.
translation.zh: 你一直都是一位雄辩家 奥吉

translation.en: Your opening arguments, I was impressed.
translation.zh: 你当时的开庭陈词让我印象深刻

translation.en: I watched that tape back a few times.
translation.zh: 我回看了几遍录像

translation.en: That may have been the last time…
translation.zh: 那也许是最后一次…

translation.en: you know…
translation.zh: 你知道的…

translation.en: -The last time you were impressed? -The last time we were all together.
translation.zh: -最后一次令你印象深刻吗？ -我们一家最后一次在一起

translation.en: That day was the last day we were all in the same place.
translation.zh: 那天是最后一次 所有人活着

translation.en: Alive.
translation.zh: 出现在同一个地方

translation.en: [Auguste] Thank you, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 谢谢 法官阁下

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen…
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们…

translation.en: my name is Charles Auguste Dupin.
translation.zh: 我叫查尔斯·奥古斯都·杜潘

translation.en: And it is my privilege to represent the United States of America
translation.zh: 我很荣幸… （两周前）

translation.en: against Fortunato Pharmaceuticals
translation.zh: …代表美国起诉弗特纳多制药公司

translation.en: and the Usher crime family.
translation.zh: 以及亚瑟犯罪家族

translation.en: Today, I want to tell you why the United States government
translation.zh: 今天 我想要告诉各位 为什么美国政府

translation.en: has finally brought these charges
translation.zh: 会最终提出这些

translation.en: in what will be the most meaningful pharmaceutical prosecution
translation.zh: 将成为我们国家历史上最具意义的

translation.en: in the history of our country.
translation.zh: 针对制药公司的指控

translation.en: Now, I know, there have already been a lot of headlines about Fortunato Pharma.
translation.zh: 我知道 已经有很多头条新闻 报道过弗特纳多制药公司

translation.en: About Ligodone.
translation.zh: 报道过利果多恩

translation.en: About the opioid epidemic in our homes and streets.
translation.zh: 以及在我们家里 和街上泛滥的阿片类药物

translation.en: The mountain of corpses that piled up since Roderick Usher,
translation.zh: 自从罗德里克·亚瑟上任后 尸体堆积如山

translation.en: he's sitting over there, began marketing his painkillers decades ago.
translation.zh: 他现在就坐在那里 几十年前就开始止疼药的市场推广

translation.en: The Usher family under CEO Roderick Usher and COO Madeline Usher
translation.zh: 亚瑟家族在CEO罗德里克·亚瑟 和首席运营官玛德琳·亚瑟的领导下

translation.en: spent four decades growing Fortunato into one of the most profitable,
translation.zh: 用了四十年时间让弗特纳多制药公司 发展成为了世界上最赚钱

translation.en: powerful companies on the planet Earth.
translation.zh: 最强大的公司之一

translation.en: They've achieved this by doing awful, awful things.
translation.zh: 他们通过做一些骇人听闻的事 来实现这一点

translation.en: Flagrantly violating regulations, statutes and the most fundamental ethics.
translation.zh: 明目张胆地违反法规、条例 和最基本的道德准则

translation.en: And at the cost of people's lives.
translation.zh: 并以人的生命为代价

translation.en: We will prove that Fortunato, as a matter of policy,
translation.zh: 我们将会证明弗特纳多制药公司 在其公司政策方面

translation.en: engages in misleading marketing practices.
translation.zh: 涉及误导性营销行为

translation.en: It claims its products are safe and effective,
translation.zh: 该公司声称其产品安全有效

translation.en: and destroys any evidence that they are not.
translation.zh: 并销毁任何能反证这一点的证据

translation.en: Burns evidence, fabricates evidence,
translation.zh: 销毁证据、伪造证据

translation.en: destroys, defiles, degrades and defrauds.
translation.zh: 破坏、污损、贬低以及欺诈

translation.en: And the reason they aren't sweating,
translation.zh: 而他们之所以肆无忌惮

translation.en: the reason their lead attorney and enforcer Mr. Arthur Pym--
translation.zh: 他们的首席律师和执行者 阿瑟·皮姆先生之所以…

translation.en: -Objection. -[Judge] Sustained.
translation.zh: -反对 -反对有效

translation.en: Their lead attorney, Mr. Arthur Pym,
translation.zh: 他们的首席律师 阿瑟·皮姆先生

translation.en: he's the one doing the crossword puzzle while I'm talking.
translation.zh: 我此刻正在讲话的时候 他却在玩填字游戏

translation.en: They believe that people like them don't go to prison.
translation.zh: 他们认为他们这样的人不会坐牢

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, they're right.
translation.zh: 女士们 先生们 他们是对的

translation.en: In 40 years, not one thing, not one indictment, not one charge.
translation.zh: 在40年里 不曾有一件事 一次指控 一次控告

translation.en: Not even a speeding ticket.
translation.zh: 甚至连一张超速罚单都没有

translation.en: Not one consequence has stuck to Roderick Usher
translation.zh: 没有给罗德里克·亚瑟 或是玛德琳·亚瑟

translation.en: or Madeline Usher or anyone else in the family.
translation.zh: 或是这个家族里的任何其他人 带来任何后果

translation.en: -Objection. -Sustained.
translation.zh: -反对 -反对有效

translation.en: The House of Usher has weathered every storm,
translation.zh: 亚瑟一家躲过了所有的不利

translation.en: sling and arrow and stands higher,
translation.zh: 厄运和灾难 并且地位越来越高

translation.en: stronger and darker today than ever before.
translation.zh: 相比以往 越来越强势、越黑暗

translation.en: But you're going to hear something else too.
translation.zh: 但你们也会听到一些其他事

translation.en: Something they don't expect.
translation.zh: 出乎他们意料的事

translation.en: And the reason why this trial's going to have a different outcome.
translation.zh: 并且也是为什么这次审判 会有一个不同的结果

translation.en: You're going to hear from one of them.
translation.zh: 你们将会听到他们其中一人发言

translation.en: An informant from within the inner circle.
translation.zh: 他们核心圈子里的一个爆料者

translation.en: Someone so close to this family's crimes,
translation.zh: 一个与这个家族的犯罪活动 密切相关的人

translation.en: their testimony and evidence will be unimpeachable.
translation.zh: 那个人的证词和证据将会无懈可击

translation.en: -Objection! -[Judge] Approach.
translation.zh: -反对！ -请上前来

translation.en: If such a witness exists,
translation.zh: 如果真有这样一位证人存在

translation.en: they have not been made known to the defense.
translation.zh: 辩方之前对此并不知晓

translation.en: That violates basic discovery,
translation.zh: 这违背了基本强制披露原则

translation.en: and the government knows better, Your Honor.
translation.zh: 控方对此应该更了解才对 法官阁下

translation.en: This witness came forward at great personal risk,
translation.zh: 这位证人冒着极大的个人风险出庭

translation.en: would be in danger if exposed.
translation.zh: 如果身份曝光将是很危险的

translation.en: They even fear for their life.
translation.zh: 他们甚至担心会有生命危险

translation.en: Your Honor, we have reason to believe this courtroom is compromised.
translation.zh: 法官阁下 我们相信这个法庭 并非密不透风

translation.en: [Arthur] That's absurd!
translation.zh: 荒谬！

translation.en: And until we are satisfied, we will keep this informant's identity confidential.
translation.zh: 直到我们认为合适 我们将对这位证人的身份继续保密

translation.en: The government's position is that the danger is real and immediate.
translation.zh: 控方认为这种危险是直接的

translation.en: All the more reason not to mention this in your opening argument, Mr. Dupin.
translation.zh: 在你的开庭陈词里最好不要提及此事 杜潘先生

translation.en: You're right. Your Honor, I…
translation.zh: 您说得对 法官大人 我…

translation.en: Well, I got ahead of myself.
translation.zh: 好吧 我得意忘形了

translation.en: I'm not the young lawyer I used to be. I'll happily strike.
translation.zh: 我已经不是从前的那个年轻律师了 我愿意划去这一条

translation.en: [Judge] We'll disregard the allusion to an informant for the time being.
translation.zh: 我们暂时忽略提到有一位证人的话

translation.en: Strike from the record, please.
translation.zh: 请在庭审记录上划去这一段

translation.en: Well, I think we're all frustrated.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想我们都觉得很挫败

translation.en: In the past year, what?
translation.zh: 在过去一年里 有多少？

translation.en: Fifty-four, fifty-five thousand people have died because…
translation.zh: 有五万四千、五万五千人死于…

translation.en: of greed.
translation.zh: 贪婪

translation.en: -Family dinner. -All of them?
translation.zh: -家族晚餐 -所有人吗？

translation.en: Spouses too.
translation.zh: 带上配偶

translation.en: [Auguste] No, this is not a joyful day for me.
translation.zh: 不 今天让我心情不愉快

translation.en: I wish that individuals like the Ushers
translation.zh: 我希望亚瑟家族的人

translation.en: would take responsibility for things they've caused in people's lives.
translation.zh: 会为他们给他人生命造成的伤害负责

translation.en: [Frederick] Holy fuck, this is bad.
translation.zh: （医药法） 妈呀 这很糟糕

translation.en: Dad doesn't do family dinners. This is about one thing.
translation.zh: 爸爸平常不会组织家庭聚餐 这只有一个原因

translation.en: -The mole. -[Lenore] Informant.
translation.zh: -那个卧底 -告密者

translation.en: A mole is one of them who infiltrated us,
translation.zh: 卧底是对方的人渗透进来

translation.en: an informant is one of us giving something to them.
translation.zh: 告密者是我们自己人透漏消息给对方

translation.en: Okay, so a mole is like Leonardo DiCaprio in The Departed,
translation.zh: 好吧 所以卧底是《无间行者》里 小李子演的那个人

translation.en: an informant is Jack Nicholson in The Departed.
translation.zh: 告密者则是 杰克·尼克尔森演的那个人

translation.en: He was! Nicholson was talking to the Feds the whole time.
translation.zh: 没错！尼克尔森一直 都跟联邦调查局有联系

translation.en: I get it. There are other movies, Dad.
translation.zh: 我懂了 还有其他电影 爸爸

translation.en: -Not as good as The Departed. -Look at this one.
translation.zh: -没有《无间行者》好 -看看这个

translation.en: You are getting ridiculously good at that, honey.
translation.zh: 你太擅长那个了 亲爱的

translation.en: -Well, I want your dad to love it. -[ball thuds]
translation.zh: 不过我希望你爸会喜欢

translation.en: And this always just delights him when he's in such a mood.
translation.zh: 希望这会让他高兴 他心情很差

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, yeah, there's a…
translation.zh: 好吧 是的…

translation.en: [sighs] …an informant in the family.
translation.zh: 家族里有个告密者

translation.en: I mean, that can't be true, can it? [sighs]
translation.zh: 这不可能 对吗？

translation.en: I don't think it can be true. If it is true, it's Perry.
translation.zh: 我不觉得这是真的 如果是真的 那肯定是佩里

translation.en: Oh, he's just a kid, Freddie.
translation.zh: 哦 他只是个孩子 弗莱迪

translation.en: Who knows what that crazy little sh-- Sorry, honey.
translation.zh: 谁知道那个疯小子…抱歉 亲爱的

translation.en: Who knows what that crazy little spit-head will or won't do?
translation.zh: 谁知道那个疯小子会干什么 不会干什么？

translation.en: And why the fuck-- Sorry, honey.
translation.zh: 而且他妈的为什么…抱歉 亲爱的

translation.en: Why the fuck would anybody think it would serve their best interests
translation.zh: 他妈的为什么有人觉得向政府告密

translation.en: to become a goddamn informant for the government?
translation.zh: 会对他们有好处？

translation.en: Well, I mean, they'd have to be pretty brave, I guess.
translation.zh: 好吧 我想他们应该挺勇敢的吧

translation.en: Are the charges true?
translation.zh: 那些指控是真的吗？

translation.en: Because if not, we've got nothing to worry about,
translation.zh: 因为如果不是 那就没什么好担心的

translation.en: but if someone really broke the law, shouldn't they be punished?
translation.zh: 可如果真有人违法了 难道他们不该受到惩罚吗？

translation.en: Lenore, that is a brave and thoughtful thing to say.
translation.zh: 丽诺尔 这么说很勇敢 也很体贴

translation.en: Especially if you want to get written out of the will.
translation.zh: 尤其是如果你 想被排除在遗嘱之外的话

translation.en: [Bill] You don't think he'd do that, do you?
translation.zh: 你不会认为他会那么做吧？

translation.en: The only thing you can say about Freddie is
translation.zh: 弗莱迪的问题在于

translation.en: he wants Dad to love him more than anything.
translation.zh: 他想要爸爸爱他胜过爱任何东西

translation.en: He's shit at business, but he wouldn't do anything to piss him off.
translation.zh: 他做生意不行 但他不会惹爸爸生气

translation.en: My money is on one of the bastards.
translation.zh: 我打赌是某个私生子干的

translation.en: Maybe we've all just underestimated Freddie.
translation.zh: 也许我们都低估了弗莱迪

translation.en: When your dad goes down, Freddie's on the throne.
translation.zh: 也许我们都低估了弗莱迪 弗莱迪是继承人 也许他在逼爸爸早点退位

translation.en: Maybe he's giving him a little push.
translation.zh: 弗莱迪是继承人 也许他在逼爸爸早点退位

translation.en: Why bother?
translation.zh: 干吗多此一举？

translation.en: He gets everything, no matter how inept he is, apparently.
translation.zh: 不管他有多难堪大任 他显然都会继承一切

translation.en: Just look at his name.
translation.zh: 就看看他的名字

translation.en: Frederick is as close to Roderick as you get without a junior.
translation.zh: 弗莱德里克跟罗德里克非常相似 就差叫小罗德里克了

translation.en: I don't know why he didn't just call him Froderick.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么不干脆就叫 弗罗德里克

translation.en: -Oh, it's probably Perry. -What about your new stepmom?
translation.zh: -可能是佩里 -那你的那位新继母呢？

translation.en: -Could be Juno. -Shut it!
translation.zh: -可能是朱诺 -闭嘴！

translation.en: Don't mention her ever. She doesn't exist. Do you understand?
translation.zh: 提都别提她 没她这个人 明白吗？

translation.en: She's not in the will, is she? He has to be smarter than that.
translation.zh: 她不在遗嘱里 对吗？ 他应该不会那么糊涂

translation.en: Doesn't exist.
translation.zh: 不存在

translation.en: Also doesn't know anything.
translation.zh: 而且什么都不知道

translation.en: -God, the timing. Bill-- -You could always push back the launch.
translation.zh: -天啊 太不是时候了 比尔… -上市发行的事可以先放放

translation.en: No. No way.
translation.zh: 不 不行

translation.en: Goldbug has to go off on time.
translation.zh: 金甲虫必须准时上市发售

translation.en: I built the launch date into the presentation.
translation.zh: 介绍里有上市发售日期

translation.en: -Dad's already signed off. -I mean, the trial.
translation.zh: -爸爸已经签字同意了 -我是说因为审判

translation.en: All the rest, the world will understand, Tammy.
translation.zh: 其他的事公众会理解的 塔米

translation.en: I don't give a shit about the world.
translation.zh: 我才不在乎什么公众

translation.en: I care about what Dad thinks, and he'd ride this out, so we ride it out.
translation.zh: 我在乎的是爸爸的看法 如果他能安然无事 我们就能

translation.en: Goldbug will show him that the Usher empire should be a matriarchy.
translation.zh: 金甲虫会向他证明 亚瑟帝国应该是母权制的

translation.en: And Tamerlane Usher should be the queen. So just tell me what you need.
translation.zh: 而帖木尔·亚瑟应该是女王 所以只要告诉我你需要什么

translation.en: I need Bill T. Wilson.
translation.zh: 我需要比尔·T·威尔逊

translation.en: So you just keep being him, okay?
translation.zh: 所以你只要继续做他就可以 好吗？

translation.en: You warm up BILLT Nation,
translation.zh: 你让比尔T王国活跃起来

translation.en: you keep those 10 million subscribers all frothy for me.
translation.zh: 让那一千万订阅者替我造势

translation.en: You know Blippi has 12 million?
translation.zh: 你知道比利皮 有1200万订阅者吗？

translation.en: Fuck Blippi. And fuck this trial. And fuck this informant.
translation.zh: 操那个比利皮 操他妈的审判 操那个告密者

translation.en: Speaking of fucking…
translation.zh: 说到操人…

translation.en: Who knows how late this goes tonight. I canceled the girl.
translation.zh: 谁知道今晚要弄到多晚 我叫那个女孩不用来了

translation.en: [hesitates] I didn't know there was a girl tonight.
translation.zh: 我不知道今晚有个女孩要来

translation.en: Well, there was and she's cancelled. Well, pushed, today.
translation.zh: 本来有 但我叫她不用来了 好吧 是推迟了 就在今天

translation.en: Dad needs to see his kids don't need half a billion dollars
translation.zh: 得让爸爸看到他的孩子们不需要五亿

translation.en: and an endless supply of test monkeys to be successful.
translation.zh: 也不需要不停地用猴子试验就能成功

translation.en: [Alessandra] Just about got it.
translation.zh: 就快成功了

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Alessandra] All right. Let's close her up.
translation.zh: 行了 我们来给她缝合吧

translation.en: Then cross our fingers.
translation.zh: 然后就祈祷吧

translation.en: [Victorine] It worked. It really fucking worked.
translation.zh: 成功了 真的成功了

translation.en: I have to say,
translation.zh: 我不得不说

translation.en: I think we're going to struggle to get peer review.
translation.zh: 我们想要通过同行评审会很难

translation.en: Don't say it's because of the nightshade.
translation.zh: 别说是因为那棵龙葵

translation.en: Because of the nightshade. I am gonna say it again.
translation.zh: 是因为那棵龙葵 我还会再说一遍的

translation.en: This new powder your dad sent over…
translation.zh: 你爸送过来的这种新粉

translation.en: -Oh. [scoffs] -…it's gonna poison the study.
translation.zh: 会坑了这项研究的

translation.en: Hey. You hear those stories?
translation.zh: 嘿 你听说那些故事了吗？

translation.en: Tourists in South America get powder blown in their face
translation.zh: 在南美有游客脸上沾上了粉

translation.en: and it paralyzes them?
translation.zh: 结果害他们瘫痪了

translation.en: This is the same stuff.
translation.zh: 这就是那种东西

translation.en: Our trial's never going to look legit
translation.zh: 如果我们用弗特纳多公司的

translation.en: if we're using an experimental Fortunato paralytic.
translation.zh: 导致瘫痪的试验药物 我们的试验看上去永远都有问题

translation.en: We'll just have to keep it away from Perry.
translation.zh: 我们只要别让佩里知道就行了

translation.en: Or it'll end up in some co-ed's drink.
translation.zh: 不然会在男女混校的饮料里发现它的

translation.en: -You sure you want me to come tonight? -What?
translation.zh: -你确定要我今晚去你家吗？ -什么？

translation.en: Seems like everybody's going to have their guns out after court today.
translation.zh: 似乎今天的庭审之后 大家都会亮出武器

translation.en: -The informant? -No, you have to come.
translation.zh: -那个告密者呢？ -不 你一定要来

translation.en: It's Camille, we all know it's Camille.
translation.zh: 是卡米尔 我们都知道是卡米尔

translation.en: -It's going to be a bloodbath. -They said, bring Al.
translation.zh: -这将是一场大屠杀 -他们说了要带艾尔来

translation.en: I'm sorry, Dr. Ruiz, but you have to come.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 鲁伊兹医生 但你必须来

translation.en: [Leo] You absolutely cannot come.
translation.zh: 你绝对不能来

translation.en: [Julius] I'd like to meet your family.
translation.zh: 我想见见你的家人

translation.en: But there's a whole process for that. Significant others are a thing.
translation.zh: 但那要有个过程 带另一半见家长可是件大事

translation.en: You don't want that yet.
translation.zh: 你现在应该不会想那么做

translation.en: The prenup's like a fucking phone book.
translation.zh: 婚前协议会有电话簿那么厚

translation.en: [Julius] Leo, you let me move in, but you won't let me meet your family?
translation.zh: 莱奥 你让我跟你同居 却不肯让我见你的家人？

translation.en: That's right. I don't know when I'm going to get back,
translation.zh: 是的 我不知道自己什么时候会回去

translation.en: but we'll talk about it then.
translation.zh: 但我们到时候再谈这件事

translation.en: [Julius] I'll be right up. I'm in the elevator. -We can talk about it in a minute. -Oh.
translation.zh: 我现在在电梯里 我们马上就可以谈

translation.en: You're in the elevator.
translation.zh: 你现在在电梯里

translation.en: Okay, see you in a sec. [sighs]
translation.zh: 好吧 等会儿见

translation.en: -You've got to go. -You promised a selfie.
translation.zh: -你得走了 -你答应过跟我合照的

translation.en: Now. Fuck.
translation.zh: 立刻 该死

translation.en: Okay, you are going to have to wait out here, okay?
translation.zh: 好吧 你得在外面等着 好吗？

translation.en: Are you fucking serious?
translation.zh: 你他妈是认真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: There's a blanket on the sofa, hide under that or something.
translation.zh: 沙发上有毯子 藏到那下面

translation.en: I don't know. Come on.
translation.zh: 我不知道 快点

translation.en: I'll let you out when he goes to the bathroom.
translation.zh: 等他去洗手间时 你就可以溜出去了

translation.en: Okay. My friends aren't going to believe I met Napoleon Usher.
translation.zh: 好吧 我的朋友肯定不敢相信 我跟拿破仑·亚瑟约会过

translation.en: -Okay. -[giggles]
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -Hey. Why are you home early? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 嘿 你怎么提前回来了？

translation.en: -Not that I'm complaining. -I figured, um… shit might hit the fan.
translation.zh: -我这不是抱怨 -我感觉情况会变得更糟

translation.en: I saw the clips on the news.
translation.zh: 我看到新闻视频报道了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: -[exhales] Okay. -[inhales]
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: You sure I can't come with you?
translation.zh: 你确定我不能跟你一起去吗？

translation.en: -No, I don't think that's a good idea. -[meows]
translation.zh: 我觉得那不是个好主意

translation.en: It was on the news? You're kidding. It was all over the news.
translation.zh: -上新闻了吗？ -开什么玩笑？新闻上铺天盖地都是

translation.en: -Hey, Pluto. -[Pluto meows]
translation.zh: 嘿 布鲁托

translation.en: Hey, sweetie. Are you being good for Other Daddy? Are you?
translation.zh: 嘿 宝贝 你跟另一个爸爸 在一起乖吗？乖吗？

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Why don't we put the news on in the bedroom?
translation.zh: 不如我们去卧室里看新闻吧？

translation.en: [Camille] We're coming out swinging. Front-facing stuff.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们看上去还挺时髦的 露了正脸

translation.en: Softballs like Fox,
translation.zh: 福克斯频道的软蛋

translation.en: Hannity knows which side his dick's buttered on. He'll be friendly.
translation.zh: 哈尼帝 我们可以拍他的马屁 他会很友好的

translation.en: Tucker?
translation.zh: 塔克？

translation.en: I just threw up in my mouth a little bit.
translation.zh: 我刚吐了一点在嘴里

translation.en: Yes, um, call Bresnickan at Vanity Fair, see if he wants a profile on Leo.
translation.zh: 对 给《名利场》的布莱斯尼肯 打电话 看看他想不想采访下莱奥

translation.en: We can let Leo help out for a change.
translation.zh: 让莱奥帮忙转移下视线

translation.en: He can talk about his Jordans, and his charity work.
translation.zh: 他会谈论他的乔丹鞋、他的慈善工作

translation.en: Kimmel, Colbert, also Leo.
translation.zh: 基梅尔、科尔伯特 还有莱奥

translation.en: And fuck it, fine, Victorine as well, Victorine will work for Vanity and Cosmo.
translation.zh: 还有去他的 好吧 还有维多琳 给维多琳安排《名利场》与《都市》

translation.en: -For some reason, people like her. -Uh, your step…
translation.zh: -人们喜欢她 -你的继…

translation.en: Juno will be at the Met this weekend, your dad's office asked for some Page Six.
translation.zh: 朱诺这周末会在大都市博物馆 你父亲的办公室要我们做做宣传

translation.en: They scraped her off an emergency room floor. Do they think I can turn her into Princess Grace?
translation.zh: 她一点也不精致 我可没法把她变成格蕾丝王妃

translation.en: Old enough to be her grandfather. That'll never not be gross.
translation.zh: 爸爸年纪都够当她的祖父了 不恶心才怪

translation.en: It's fine, whatever. Fine. Give them what they want.
translation.zh: 好吧 随便吧 他们想要什么就给他们什么

translation.en: Um, priority one is the informant.
translation.zh: 首要事项是找出那个告密者

translation.en: I want you to start with Perry obviously, but I don't think
translation.zh: （开庭陈词揭秘 亚瑟家族内部有告密者） 从佩里开始 但我觉得

translation.en: he's clever enough to keep it off TikTok if he was dealing with the Feds.
translation.zh: 如果他在跟联邦调查局联系 他不可能不发TikTok的

translation.en: Do you need us after dinner?
translation.zh: 晚餐之后你需要我们吗？

translation.en: No, not tonight.
translation.zh: 不 今晚不需要

translation.en: What I do need is for you to stay on top of Victorine and the rest of it.
translation.zh: 我需要的是你们掌握维多琳 还有其他的情况

translation.en: If this informant is real, I have to find them.
translation.zh: 如果这个告密者真的存在 我必须要把他找出来

translation.en: It's tough with Victorine. She knows you're watching.
translation.zh: 维多琳很难搞 她知道你在监视她

translation.en: I know, you'll figure it out. We're gonna find out who's talking to the Feds.
translation.zh: 我知道 你们想办法搞定 我们会找出是谁在跟联邦调查局联系

translation.en: Then I'll freeze their fucking head and give it to my father on a platinum plate.
translation.zh: 然后我就会把他的脑袋冻起来 放在铂金盘子上送给爸爸

translation.en: See if Cartier will make a platinum plate.
translation.zh: 看看卡地亚能不能做个铂金盘子

translation.en: I still am so nervous.
translation.zh: 我现在依然非常紧张

translation.en: I've never hosted anything before.
translation.zh: 我以前从没做过主持

translation.en: Moderated an NA meeting once.
translation.zh: 曾经主持过一次匿名戒毒会

translation.en: And only once. It was a disaster.
translation.zh: 但只有那一次 结果一团糟

translation.en: You'll be great. You don't have to do anything.
translation.zh: 你会做得很棒的 你什么都不用做

translation.en: But all of them? All at once?
translation.zh: 但他们所有人都来吗？一起？

translation.en: Thank God we didn't have a wedding. I didn't have to look them all in the eye.
translation.zh: 谢天谢地我们之前没办婚礼 我不用看着他们的眼睛

translation.en: -They hate me. -They don't.
translation.zh: -他们讨厌我 -没有的事

translation.en: Well, except Freddie.
translation.zh: 好吧 除了弗莱迪

translation.en: But I'm pretty sure he's just kissing your arse.
translation.zh: 我很肯定他是在讨好你

translation.en: They will love you because I love you, and the only thing stronger than love
translation.zh: 他们会爱你的 因为我爱你 而且唯一比爱还强有力的

translation.en: is how scared they are of getting cut out of the will.
translation.zh: 就是他们很怕被踢出遗嘱

translation.en: -[door opens] -[man] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 打扰了

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Don, what are you doing here? Have you met my wife?
translation.zh: 你怎么来了？你之前见过我妻子吗？

translation.en: Juno, this is Dr. Donaldson. He's been with me a long time now.
translation.zh: 朱诺 这位是唐纳德森医生 他为我服务很长时间了

translation.en: He'll be taking over your care soon as you're done with Lewis.
translation.zh: 既然你不再用刘易斯了 那就由他来接手照顾你

translation.en: I was going to call, but figured this was important enough that, uh…
translation.zh: 我本来是要打电话的 但我想这件事非常重要 需要…

translation.en: I need to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我得跟你谈谈

translation.en: -Go ahead. -[Donaldson] Alone, I think might be best.
translation.zh: -请说吧 -单独谈谈 我想那样或许最好

translation.en: Hey. Prospero is here.
translation.zh: 嘿 普罗斯佩罗来了

translation.en: You ready for him?
translation.zh: 你准备好见他了吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Prospero] This is a Glenfiddich. '96.
translation.zh: 这是一瓶1996年的格兰菲迪

translation.en: -'96, the year… -The year I was born. Yes. Exactly.
translation.zh: -1996年 就是… -我出生的那年 是的 没错

translation.en: Glenfiddich is totally into this idea, by the way.
translation.zh: 顺便说一下 格兰菲迪喜欢这个想法

translation.en: We make it the official whiskey of the club
translation.zh: 把这个作为俱乐部的官方威士忌

translation.en: and they open up the entire library of bottles to us.
translation.zh: 并让他们把所有的藏酒都给我们

translation.en: You've had a year, a calendar year
translation.zh: 你之前有一年时间

translation.en: to come up with a proposal for your first business venture,
translation.zh: 来为你的创业公司准备一份提案

translation.en: a venture we'd like to support, and you've come up with a nightclub.
translation.zh: 一家我们想要支持的公司 结果你想出来的却是开一间夜店

translation.en: Yes. Obviously, you're not thinking big enough.
translation.zh: 是的 显然 你的格局不够大

translation.en: Is the flagship club going to be amazing?
translation.zh: 旗舰店会非常棒吗？

translation.en: Of course it is, but it's the franchise possibilities,
translation.zh: 当然了 但更棒的是 开成连锁店的可能性

translation.en: Prospero Rome, Prospero New York, Prospero Dubai…
translation.zh: 普罗斯佩罗罗马店 纽约店、迪拜店…

translation.en: Well, outside of naming this, uh, establishment after yourself,
translation.zh: 除了用你的名字命名这家店

translation.en: what else makes it at all worthwhile?
translation.zh: 它还有什么值得让人投资的地方？

translation.en: Well, this isn't a fucking Dave & Buster's, Aunt Madeline,
translation.zh: 可这不是他妈的廉价夜店 玛德琳姑姑

translation.en: I'm talking Berghain. Limelight.
translation.zh: 我说的可是伯肯、风头那种爆火的店

translation.en: Prospero's will be one of the most exclusive nightclubs in the entire world.
translation.zh: 普罗斯佩罗将成为全世界 最高档的夜店之一

translation.en: We'll turn movie stars and monarchs away with attitude,
translation.zh: 我们会高傲地拒绝 电影明星和权贵入内

translation.en: we're going to make Studio 54 look like fucking Romper Room.
translation.zh: 我们会让54工作室 看上去像是闹着玩的一样

translation.en: And you're going to do this by marking up bottles of Glenfiddich.
translation.zh: 而你实现这一目标的做法 是靠给格兰菲迪涨价

translation.en: I'm not selling Glenfiddich. I'm-- I'm selling…
translation.zh: 我不是在卖格兰菲迪 我是在贩卖…

translation.en: hedonism, privilege.
translation.zh: 快乐主义、特权

translation.en: It's a dark room with killer music, few rules, fewer consequences.
translation.zh: 一个幽暗的房间 放着爆赞的音乐 没有限制 没有后果

translation.en: It's where the movie starlet everybody fucking worships
translation.zh: 人人爱慕的女明星在房间角落里

translation.en: is busy giving head to the real VIPs, in the corner.
translation.zh: 忙着给真正的大人物口交

translation.en: Let me come to the office, show you the numbers,
translation.zh: 让我去办公室 给你看看数字

translation.en: franchise projections are good.
translation.zh: 连锁店的盈利预测非常好

translation.en: -I'm thinking a tiered membership-- -Roderick, please, any time.
translation.zh: -我想搞分级会员制… -罗德里克 你随时可以说了

translation.en: Oh, tiered membership, why didn't you say so? No.
translation.zh: 哦 分级会员制 你怎么不早说？不行

translation.en: We won't set up a meeting at the office.
translation.zh: 不用来办公室了

translation.en: Being an Usher is about changing the fucking world.
translation.zh: 亚瑟家族的人是要他妈的改变世界

translation.en: It's not a blow job whisky bar.
translation.zh: 不是搞什么口交威士忌酒吧

translation.en: Look at the numbers. I'll come to the office on Monday and you can--
translation.zh: 就看一下预测 我周一过来 到时候你们可以…

translation.en: Fuck's sake. That's all.
translation.zh: 行了 就说到这里吧

translation.en: Well, I don't think he's the informant, but got no clue about business.
translation.zh: 我觉得他不是那个告密者 但他对做生意一窍不通

translation.en: I know it's important to you everybody gets that first loan, but--
translation.zh: 我知道对你来说每个人都获得 那第一笔借款很重要 但是…

translation.en: He's not making it easy.
translation.zh: 他让事情很难办

translation.en: Let's get in there and watch their eyes.
translation.zh: 我们去那儿 看着他们的眼睛

translation.en: When the paperwork's passed out, I'll be able to tell.
translation.zh: 等给他们发文件签字的时候 我就能看出来

translation.en: What is going on with you?
translation.zh: 你怎么了？

translation.en: -Something is going on with you. -All good.
translation.zh: -你有事 -我没事

translation.en: Right behind you.
translation.zh: 你先过去吧

translation.en: For the road.
translation.zh: 去之前先喝一杯

translation.en: I thought we could all benefit from this. Um, Pharmaceutical Law.
translation.zh: 我觉得这会对我们有利 《医药法》

translation.en: -Maybe something in here can help us. -[Roderick] No, really?
translation.zh: -也许这里有些东西能帮到我们 -不会吧 真的吗？

translation.en: Arthur, dig into this book. Find something for our defense.
translation.zh: 阿瑟 好好看看这本书 找出对我们辩护有用的东西

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Wait, it's… cake. -[light applause]
translation.zh: 等一下 这是…蛋糕

translation.en: Well, I swear, if your TV show had been about your cakes, it would have run 20 seasons.
translation.zh: 如果你那个电视节目拍的是你的蛋糕 那它能拍20季

translation.en: [Morrie chuckles] Care to wash it down?
translation.zh: 想喝点什么吗？

translation.en: Coffee?
translation.zh: 咖啡？

translation.en: -No way. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 不会吧

translation.en: I bet it's cake.
translation.zh: 我猜是蛋糕

translation.en: Freddie, marrying this woman might be the one thing you didn't fuck up.
translation.zh: 弗莱迪 娶了这个女人 是你唯一一件没有搞砸的事

translation.en: She's a genius.
translation.zh: 她是个天才

translation.en: [chuckles] Well…
translation.zh: 嗯…

translation.en: We have that in common then, Dad. We're both lucky men.
translation.zh: 那我们父子就有共同点了 爸爸 我们都是幸运的男人

translation.en: Oh, for fuck's sake, Freddie.
translation.zh: 我的天啊 弗莱迪

translation.en: All right, while you all eat the law,
translation.zh: 行了 在你们吃下那块法典蛋糕时

translation.en: Mr. Pym has some important paperwork for each of you.
translation.zh: 皮姆先生有些重要文件给你们所有人

translation.en: [Camille] Paperwork from the Pym Reaper, always a blast.
translation.zh: 死神皮姆给的文件一向都很有趣

translation.en: Wait. Is this also cake?
translation.zh: 等等 这也是蛋糕吗？

translation.en: This is a robust,
translation.zh: 这是一份稳健

translation.en: new non-disclosure agreement, and it is consequential.
translation.zh: 新的保密协议 有法律后果

translation.en: [Camille] Forfeiture of inheritance? Waiving of civil suits…
translation.zh: 丧失继承权？放弃民事诉讼…

translation.en: We really should get together more often, it's a balm for the soul.
translation.zh: 我们应该多聚聚 这真是灵魂的慰藉

translation.en: Consequence only applies if it's proven you violated the agreements.
translation.zh: 只有在你被证明违反协议的情况下 才会有法律后果

translation.en: So it seems to me no one has anything to worry about.
translation.zh: 所以我觉得大家没什么可担心的

translation.en: Unless they have something to worry about.
translation.zh: 除非有人有要担心的事

translation.en: [Madeline] Exactly. And your father and I appreciate
translation.zh: 没错 而且我和你们的父亲很欣赏

translation.en: this display of confidence, loyalty and family. Now sign it.
translation.zh: 你们所表现出的自信、忠诚 和对家族的重视 现在把它签了吧

translation.en: It's been a minute since I've gotten to feel like a member of the family.
translation.zh: 作为这个家族的一员感觉一直都很棒

translation.en: Al, have you gotten to sign an original Pym yet?
translation.zh: 艾尔 你签过皮姆亲自拟的文件吗？

translation.en: It's a rite of passage. Wait until you see the prenup.
translation.zh: 那就像一次成人礼 签婚前协议时更惊喜

translation.en: Yes, speaking of prenups, how are things, Juno?
translation.zh: 是啊 说到婚前协议 事情怎么样了 朱诺？

translation.en: It's going great.
translation.zh: 进展得很顺利

translation.en: Yeah, I prefer not to sign anything without my guy looking at it first.
translation.zh: 是的 任何文件我都会等我的律师 看过之后再签

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 或者不用看了

translation.en: [Victorine] While we're on the subject and, hate to point this out but,
translation.zh: 既然说到了这个话题 我不得不指出这一点

translation.en: if there were ever any one of us collecting,
translation.zh: 如果我们当中有谁收集

translation.en: or even bartering a family secret, we all know who that is.
translation.zh: 或是用家族秘密讨价还价 我们都知道那个人是谁

translation.en: -Aw, fuck you very much, Victorine. -No in-fighting. Jesus, have some dignity.
translation.zh: -去你的 维多琳 -别内斗 天啊 要点脸吧

translation.en: You want to watch me sign it?
translation.zh: 你们要看着我签吗？

translation.en: -I'll sign it right now. -How do you spell "Froderick"?
translation.zh: -我马上签 -“弗罗德里克”怎么写？

translation.en: [Madeline] Get the jokes out now because this isn't funny.
translation.zh: 行了 笑话都拿出来吧 因为眼下这事并不好笑

translation.en: Fortunato is the reason you exist.
translation.zh: 有弗特纳多制药公司才有你们

translation.en: The reason you have your little knock-offs,
translation.zh: 才有你们的小赝品

translation.en: your heart implants, your debutante balls.
translation.zh: 你们的心脏移植或是名媛舞会

translation.en: Debutante balls? Is that what you think I do?
translation.zh: 名媛舞会？你以为我是做这个的吗？

translation.en: [Madeline] The company is the family,
translation.zh: 这个公司就是这个家族

translation.en: and we expect you to defend it with your life.
translation.zh: 我们希望你们用生命来捍卫它

translation.en: And if anyone, anyone comes after us,
translation.zh: 如果有任何人要对付我们

translation.en: we will exhaust our arsenal until the threat's neutralized.
translation.zh: 我们会用尽各种武器直到威胁解除

translation.en: By neutralized, do you mean sued into oblivion,
translation.zh: 说到“解除” 你的意思是陷入无尽的官司

translation.en: taken out of the Board, out of the will, on the streets…
translation.zh: 被赶出董事会、被排除出遗嘱 被赶出家门…

translation.en: Neutralized. Like dead.
translation.zh: 解除的意思是死

translation.en: Pym made this document particularly nasty, I asked him to, but that's not the thing.
translation.zh: 皮姆的这份文件伤害相当大 是我叫他这么拟的 但重点并不在这

translation.en: When I find out who's been talking,
translation.zh: 等我找出了是谁

translation.en: to the goddamn government, against your own blood,
translation.zh: 出卖家人 向政府告密

translation.en: there won't be enough of you left to sue.
translation.zh: 到时候你剩下的钱都不够打官司的

translation.en: I'll have to sue the bloody puddle of gore in the designer shoes.
translation.zh: 我要告到你倾家荡产

translation.en: -Make no mistake, we'll find out. -$50 million.
translation.zh: -毫无疑问 我们会找出是谁的 -五千万

translation.en: To whoever solves it.
translation.zh: 给解决这件事的人

translation.en: To the lucky Usher who figures out who's talking to the Feds.
translation.zh: 给那个找出 跟联邦调查局告密的人的幸运儿

translation.en: Fifty million cash, no strings, no taxes.
translation.zh: 五千万现金 没有附加条件 不用交税

translation.en: Did you just put a--
translation.zh: 你们这是悬…

translation.en: Yes, I'm putting a bounty on you.
translation.zh: 是的 这是悬赏

translation.en: You, the shit bag, you the informant, you know who you are.
translation.zh: 你这个混蛋 你这个告密者 你心里有数

translation.en: It's 50 million. Sleep tight.
translation.zh: 五千万 睡个好觉

translation.en: The rest of you…
translation.zh: 祝你们其他人…

translation.en: happy hunting.
translation.zh: 狩猎愉快

translation.en: That was the last time I saw them together.
translation.zh: 那是我最后一次看到他们聚在一起

translation.en: Some of them, the last time I saw them alive.
translation.zh: 最后一次见到他们当中的一些人活着

translation.en: If you're saying it was because of…
translation.zh: 如果你的意思是这都是因为…

translation.en: Well…
translation.zh: 好吧…

translation.en: because of the informant thing that all of this happened,
translation.zh: 因为这一切的发生 都是因为那个告密者

translation.en: if you're somehow implying that I'm responsible, even indirectly…
translation.zh: 如果你在暗示我对此负有责任 就算是间接…

translation.en: I'm not. I know who's responsible.
translation.zh: 我没有 我知道谁负有责任

translation.en: You know who's responsible for which death?
translation.zh: 你知道谁对哪起死亡事件负有责任？

translation.en: All of them.
translation.zh: 所有的事件

translation.en: Forgive me, Roderick, but the deaths
translation.zh: 原谅我 罗德里克

translation.en: of your children have been examined,
translation.zh: 但你孩子们的死

translation.en: investigated pretty thoroughly
translation.zh: 经过了彻底的检验调查

translation.en: and, as strange as they may be, those deaths are unrelated.
translation.zh: 虽然死因都很奇怪 但彼此并无关联

translation.en: I am responsible.
translation.zh: 是我负有责任

translation.en: And more to the point,
translation.zh: 更重要的是

translation.en: perhaps…
translation.zh: 也许…

translation.en: there is a woman.
translation.zh: 有个女人负有责任

translation.en: [Madeline] I know that face.
translation.zh: 我认得那张脸

translation.en: You know her too.
translation.zh: 你也认得

translation.en: A woman I have to tell you about.
translation.zh: 一个我必须要告诉你的女人

translation.en: [Roderick] What did she do to me?
translation.zh: 她对我做了什么？

translation.en: You know my favorite holiday?
translation.zh: 你知道我最喜欢的节日吗？

translation.en: New Year's Eve. You know why? Resolutions.
translation.zh: 新年除夕夜 知道为什么吗？心愿

translation.en: People take that word for granted,
translation.zh: 人们把那个词视为理所应当

translation.en: they don't realize just how heavy a word it is.
translation.zh: 他们没意识到那个词有多沉重

translation.en: Resolution.
translation.zh: 心愿

translation.en: Resolve.
translation.zh: 决心

translation.en: Means being unwavering, determined, a firm commitment to do something, or…
translation.zh: 意思是不动摇、坚定 坚定地许诺去做某事 或是…

translation.en: not to do something.
translation.zh: 不做某事

translation.en: And most people go their whole, wasted, stupid lives
translation.zh: 可大部分人穷其荒废愚蠢的一生

translation.en: without one minute of true resolution.
translation.zh: 却没拿出一分钟真正的决心

translation.en: Not me though.
translation.zh: 可我不是

translation.en: Not me.
translation.zh: 我不是

translation.en: And not Madeline.
translation.zh: 玛德琳也不是

translation.en: ♪ Many years since I was here ♪
[woman] Costume party?
translation.zh: 化装舞会吗？

translation.en: Guessing you're Jay Gatsby, you're Daisy Buchanan.
translation.zh: 我猜你扮的是杰伊·盖茨比 而你扮的是黛西·布坎南

translation.en: -[Roderick grunts] -Gin Rickeys then? Gatsby didn't drink.
translation.zh: -那喝杜松子酒利克酒吗？ -盖茨比不喝酒

translation.en: He stayed sharp and sober. Watched everybody else drink.
translation.zh: 他保持头脑清醒 看其他人都喝什么

translation.en: -Nothing for you then? -We're drinking tonight.
translation.zh: -你不要什么吗？ -我们今晚要喝酒

translation.en: Both of us. Whisky. Neat.
translation.zh: 我们两个都要 纯威士忌

translation.en: What made you ditch the other party?
translation.zh: 怎么从那场派对出来了？

translation.en: All dressed up, didn't wait for the ball to drop?
translation.zh: 都盛装打扮了 不等新年落球仪式吗？

translation.en: -[Roderick] Hmm. -A change of scenery.
translation.zh: 换换环境

translation.en: We work up the street.
translation.zh: 我们在这条街前面上班

translation.en: Haven't seen this place. Did you just open?
translation.zh: 以前没见过这个地方 刚开的吗？

translation.en: -Sort of. -Thought it'd be more crowded.
translation.zh: -算是吧 -还以为这里会更热闹

translation.en: New Year's and all.
translation.zh: 毕竟是新年嘛

translation.en: It'll fill up later. We're a midnight business.
translation.zh: 等会儿就热闹起来了 我们这里午夜时生意火

translation.en: -Tonight, anyway. -[Roderick] Hmm.
translation.zh: 反正今晚是这样的

translation.en: You guys look like you've had a wild night already.
translation.zh: 看上去你们今晚已经玩得很疯了

translation.en: Sending '79 out with a bang, yeah?
translation.zh: 狠狠地庆祝送旧迎新？

translation.en: Well, I'll drink one with you.
translation.zh: 好吧 我跟你们喝一杯

translation.en: Don't tend to do that with customers, but here we are.
translation.zh: 我一般不跟客人喝酒 但你们是例外

translation.en: To 1979. May it rest in peace.
translation.zh: 致1979年 愿它安息

translation.en: -God, I can't believe we really did that. -Keep your voice down, Roderick.
translation.zh: -天啊 不敢相信我们真那么做了 -小点声 罗德里克

translation.en: No, I won't. What do we do now?
translation.zh: 不 我不会的 我们现在怎么办？

translation.en: We wait here.
translation.zh: 在这里等着

translation.en: Drink, but don't get drunk. Talk, but don't talk.
translation.zh: 喝酒 但别喝醉 说话 但别说太多

translation.en: If the cops aren't here by midnight, that's a good sign.
translation.zh: 到午夜时没看到警察就是好事

translation.en: Won't know for a few days.
translation.zh: 要过几天才会知道是什么情况

translation.en: The important thing is that people see us tonight.
translation.zh: 重要的是今晚要让人看到我们

translation.en: This place is good.
translation.zh: 这里就不错

translation.en: Crowded enough for a few witnesses, not so crowded that nobody notices.
translation.zh: 人够多 会让人看到我们 又不会太多以致于没人注意到我们

translation.en: I'm just excited that we get to kick Carter
translation.zh: 今年能把卡特踢出白宫

translation.en: out of the White House this year.
translation.zh: 我非常高兴

translation.en: Think Reagan's going to run?
translation.zh: 觉得里根会参选吗？

translation.en: I think if he does, it'll be a landslide and great for business.
translation.zh: 我觉得如果他参选 肯定会大获全胜 并且对生意有好处

translation.en: Sorry, I should've told you no politics at the bar. We're a classy joint.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我忘了 这里不谈政治 我们这里很高雅

translation.en: Another?
translation.zh: 再来一杯吗？

translation.en: Maybe just one
translation.zh: 也许就一杯

translation.en: then we're switching to beer, slowing down.
translation.zh: 然后我们就改喝啤酒 慢点喝

translation.en: Night's young. Whisky's pricey.
translation.zh: 天还早 威士忌很贵的

translation.en: First two are on the house. Want to start a tab?
translation.zh: 前两杯店里请了 要赊账吗？

translation.en: Buy now, pay later, what I say.
translation.zh: 我总说“先喝后买单”

translation.en: -I'm Verna. -Uh, Roderick.
translation.zh: -我是弗娜 -我是罗德里克

translation.en: -[Verna] Mmm. -This is Madeline.
translation.zh: 她是玛德琳

translation.en: Staying for the ball drop?
translation.zh: 留下来等落球仪式吗？

translation.en: -I think so. -[Verna] Mmm, that's good.
translation.zh: -我想是的 -很好

translation.en: Got another hour or so to think about your resolutions.
translation.zh: 还有一小时来想你们的新年愿望

translation.en: You know what a resolution is? It's a deal you make with the future.
translation.zh: 知道新年愿望是什么吗？ 是跟未来的约定

translation.en: The future's coming fast. It's nearly here.
translation.zh: 未来很快就要来了 马上就到了

translation.en: You already know your resolutions, don't you?
translation.zh: 你们已经想好愿望了 对吗？

translation.en: Yeah. We've got the same one.
translation.zh: 是的 我们的愿望是一样的

translation.en: We're going to change the world.
translation.zh: 我们要改变这个世界

translation.en: New Year's 1980. [chuckles] I remember what else happened that night.
translation.zh: 1980年新年 我记得那晚还发生了什么

translation.en: That was the night…
translation.zh: 就是那晚…

translation.en: [sighs] Well, you know what I'm getting at. [Roderick] Yes, I know what you're getting at.
translation.zh: -你知道我的意思 -是的 我知道

translation.en: I mean, aside from the rumors, the mystery.
translation.zh: 我是说 除了谣言 那个谜

translation.en: That was when everything changed at Fortunato.
translation.zh: 从那时起 弗特纳多制药公司的一切都变了

translation.en: People still whisper about what possibly could have happened that night.
translation.zh: 人们至今依然对那晚可能发生的事 议论纷纷

translation.en: That's where you're taking me, isn't it?
translation.zh: 你要跟我说的就是那件事 不是吗？

translation.en: [Verna] Your life will take a complete change of course.
translation.zh: 你的人生会完全改变

translation.en: Tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚

translation.en: You feel it. Both of you.
translation.zh: 你们感觉出来了 你们俩都是

translation.en: In the air.
translation.zh: 气氛如此

translation.en: We're sitting outside of time and space.
translation.zh: 我们在时间和空间之外

translation.en: We buried three of my children today.
translation.zh: 我们今天埋葬了我的三个孩子

translation.en: The other three last week.
translation.zh: 上周也埋葬了三个

translation.en: I know, and as I said, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我知道 就像我之前说的 我很遗憾

translation.en: There's a reason I'm telling you this.
translation.zh: 我现在告诉你这件事是有原因的

translation.en: My mother, my children, New Year's Eve.
translation.zh: 我母亲 我的孩子们 新年除夕

translation.en: You'll be reluctant to accept it, or believe it,
translation.zh: 你会不愿意接受或相信它

translation.en: but I promise you, every single piece is important.
translation.zh: 但我向你保证 每一件都很重要

translation.en: We buried my boy today.
translation.zh: 我今天埋葬了我儿子

translation.en: And almost nobody came this time.
translation.zh: 可这次几乎没人来

translation.en: Sixth coffin I've put in the dirt.
translation.zh: 我埋了六口棺材

translation.en: In less than two weeks.
translation.zh: 在不到两周的时间里

translation.en: [preacher] "The boundaries which divide
translation.zh: “生死界线

translation.en: life from death are at best shadowy and vague.
translation.zh: 只能说是模糊不清的

translation.en: Who shall say where the one ends and where the other begins?
translation.zh: 谁能说清一条生命的终结和起始？

translation.en: We stand on the brink of a precipice."
translation.zh: 我们站在悬崖边缘”

translation.en: -Grampus. What is it? -[preacher] "We peer into the abyss.
translation.zh: -虎鲸 -“我们凝视深渊” -怎么了？ -“我们感到恶心眩晕”

translation.en: We grow sick and dizzy."
translation.zh: -怎么了？ -“我们感到恶心眩晕”

translation.en: She's here.
translation.zh: 她来了

translation.en: [preacher] "Our first impulse is to shrink from the danger.
translation.zh: “我们的第一反应是躲避危险

translation.en: Unaccountably, we remain.
translation.zh: 但无法解释的是我们留了下来

translation.en: By slow degrees, our sickness and dizziness
translation.zh: 逐渐地 我们的恶心和眩晕

translation.en: and horror become merged in a cloud of unnamable feeling.
translation.zh: 还有恐惧合并为一种难以名状的感觉

translation.en: It is merely the idea of what would be our sensations
translation.zh: 那只是我们对于在暴风雨中

translation.en: during the sweeping precipitancy of a fall from such a height.
translation.zh: 从如此高的高度坠落下来的 感觉的设想

translation.en: And this fall, this rushing annihilation
translation.zh: 而那种坠落 那种

translation.en: for the very reason that it involves that one most ghastly and loathsome
translation.zh: 由曾出现在我们想象中的

translation.en: of all the most ghastly and loathsome images of death and suffering,
translation.zh: 那些最可怕可憎的死亡和痛苦里

translation.en: which have ever presented themselves to our imagination,
translation.zh: 最为可怕可憎的那一个 所导致的急速毁灭

translation.en: for this very cause do we now, most vividly, desire it."
translation.zh: 正是出于这个原因 我们现在强烈地渴望它”

translation.en: [reporter] Mr. Usher!
translation.zh: 亚瑟先生！

translation.en: [Madeline] Roderick, look at me.
translation.zh: 罗德里克 看着我

translation.en: Arthur, send a bus, but keep it off dispatch, no names.
translation.zh: 阿瑟 派一辆大巴来 但别让调度知道 别说名字

translation.en: In fact, designate it off duty.
translation.zh: 让那辆车下班

translation.en: Take him to Westminster under a pseudonym. Lock down the wing, maybe the whole floor.
translation.zh: 用假名把他带去威斯敏斯特 把楼的那一侧锁上 把一层都锁上

translation.en: Full security detail, and get Donaldson. No other doctors. Only Donaldson.
translation.zh: 进行全面安保 再把唐纳德森叫来 别找其他医生 只能找唐纳德森

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: It's time.
translation.zh: 时候到了

translation.en: It's time.
translation.zh: 时候到了

translation.en: It's time.
translation.zh: 时候到了
